articles.content: The Sony HT-G700 is a 3.1-channel Dolby Atmos soundbar and subwoofer combination complete with an affordable price, costing just £450 ($600/540). Why so much cheaper than other Atmos soundbars? Well, the Atmos is delivered by far fewer speakers than more expe… [+1779 chars]

articles.title: WhatsApp update offers early look at new video call feature coming to your chats - Express
articles.description: WHATSAPP has revealed an early look at how it plans to bring Facebook's all-new video call feature for 50 people into the world's most popular chat app.

articles.title: Sonos reveals all-new Arc soundbar...and that's not all that has changed - Express
articles.description: SONOS ARC is the latest soundbar from smart speaker brand Sonos. The new device gets a fresh look and a massive audio upgrade ...and it's not the only new addition to the range. Here is everything that's new.
